channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 調査：DSPに入ったドルのうち、実際に消費者が見た広告に支払われるのはわずか36セントで、29セントが仲介業者に、35セントが低品質メディアに支払われる（Catherine Perloff/Adweek）
item.description:
Catherine Perloff / Adweek:
Study: only 36 cents of every dollar that enters a DSP actually pay for an ad a consumer sees, 29 cents go to intermediaries, and 35 cents to low-quality media  —  The supply chain is still filled with waste, and impression price doesn't correlate with quality

item.title: 情報筋英閣僚は、2023年初めに辞任したリチャード・シャープの後任として、ベテランTV局幹部のサミール・シャーを早ければ今日にもBBC会長に指名する模様（Daniel Thomas/Financial Times）。
item.description:
Daniel Thomas / Financial Times:
Sources: UK ministers are set to pick veteran TV executive Samir Shah as BBC chair to replace Richard Sharp, who resigned earlier in 2023, as soon as today  —  New head of corporation's board replaces Richard Sharp, who resigned this year  —  UK ministers are set to pick veteran TV executive Samir Shah …

item.title: Twitchは2024年2月27日に韓国での営業を停止する予定であり、コスト削減に取り組んでいるにもかかわらず、韓国での営業は「法外に高い」と述べている（Jordan Fragen/VentureBeat）
item.description:
Jordan Fragen / VentureBeat:
Twitch plans to shut down in South Korea on February 27, 2024, saying the country was “prohibitively expensive” to operate in despite working to reduce costs  —  Games livestreaming platform Twitch is shutting down its business operations in South Korea February 27, 2024.

item.title: イスラエルとハマスの報道に関する2K以上の英国人の世論調査：36％がBBCを中立と見なし、5つの報道機関の中で最多、15％がBBCを親パレスチナ、17％が親イスラエルと見なす（Bron Maher/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
A poll of 2K+ Britons on Israel-Hamas coverage: 36% consider the BBC neutral, the most among five outlets; 15% see the BBC as pro-Palestinian, 17% as pro-Israel  —  But even more of those polled felt the BBC's coverage has been “mostly neutral”.  —  A poll conducted by think tank More in Common …

item.title: WSJ、MITテクノロジー・レビュー、FT、El País、グローブ・アンド・メール、BBCニュース、ミドルイースト・アイ、WaPo、その他5つの報道機関がリンクトイン・ニュースレターをどのように利用しているか（Hanaa' Tameez/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Hanaa' Tameez / Nieman Lab:
How the WSJ, MIT Technology Review, the FT, El País, The Globe and Mail, BBC News, Middle East Eye, WaPo, and five other news outlets use LinkedIn newsletters  —  “While you're less at the whim of the algorithm, it's still social media.”  —  “LinkedIn is cool now” …

item.title: トランプ新政権は、政敵だけでなくメディアをも "追及 "するだろう、とトランプ大統領の腹心で政権に就く可能性の高いカシュ・パテルは約束する（ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）。
item.description:
New York Times:
A new Trump administration would “come after” the media as well as political foes, promises Kash Patel, a Trump confidant likely to serve in the administration  —  Donald Trump, who has already promised to use the Justice Department to “go after” his political adversaries …

item.title: SAG-AFTRA組合員、78％が賛成票を投じスタジオとの新3年契約を批准、一部の組合員はAIの保護に不満を残す（Jeremy Fuster/The Wrap）
item.description:
Jeremy Fuster / The Wrap:
SAG-AFTRA members ratify the union's new three-year contract with studios after 78% voted in favor; some members remain unhappy about the deal's AI protections  —  Approval of new studio agreement with a turnout of 38% concludes a historic year for Hollywood labor

item.title: メモヤフー・ニュース、米編集チーム全員をレイオフし、Z世代とミレニアル世代向けのニュースをキュレーションしていた「イン・ザ・ノウ」部門の閉鎖を計画（Corbin Bolies/The Daily Beast）
item.description:
Corbin Bolies / The Daily Beast:
Memo: Yahoo News lays off staff across its US editorial team and plans to shut down its “In the Know” vertical, which curated news for Gen Zers and millennials  —  It's the latest news outlet to slash its payrolls as the media market takes hit after hit.

item.title: 米国務省によると、ロシアはWSJのエヴァン・ガーシュコビッチ記者を釈放する "重要な "提案を拒否した。
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
The US State Department says Russia rejected a “significant” proposal to release The WSJ's Evan Gershkovich; sources say the offer involved trading prisoners  —  U.S. seeking to win freedom for Evan Gershkovich and Paul Whelan, State Department spokesman says

item.title: ワシントン・ポスト紙の700人以上の職員が、経費削減のなかでの契約交渉の行き詰まりを理由に12月7日にストライキを計画、先週までに36人のニュースルーム職員がバイアウトを受け入れた（Andrew Beaujon/Washingtonian）
item.description:
Andrew Beaujon / Washingtonian:
Over 700 Washington Post staffers plan to strike on December 7 over stalled contract talks amid cost cuts; by last week, 36 newsroom employees accepted buyouts  —  More than 700 employees plan to walk off the job for 24 hours.  —  More than 700 Washington Post employees plan to walk off the job Thursday for a 24-hour strike.

item.title: テレ朝、NBCユニバーサル・ニュース・グループの顧問に就任するボー・フェラーリ氏の後任として、元ノティシアス・テレムンド社長のルイス・フェルナンデス氏を会長に指名（Dade Hayes/Deadline）
item.description:
Dade Hayes / Deadline:
Telemundo names former Noticias Telemundo president Luis Fernández as chairman, replacing Beau Ferrari, who will become an adviser with NBCUniversal News Group  —  - Spectrum-Disney Deal “Absolutely” Created Blueprint For Future Carriage Deals, Charter CFO Says; Q4 Broadband Subscriber Loss Warning Hits Stock

item.title: パンデミック中にDisney+のみで公開された3本のピクサー映画が、2024年に劇場公開される：ソウル』1月12日、『ターニング・レッド』2月9日、『ルカ』3月22日（Jordan Moreau/Variety）
item.description:
Jordan Moreau / Variety:
Three Pixar movies released solely on Disney+ during the pandemic will come to theaters in 2024: Soul on January 12; Turning Red, February 9; and Luca, March 22  —  The three movies will come to theaters nationwide in 2024, with tickets going on sale Jan. 2.

item.title: ディズニーの投資家アンコーラ氏、ネルソン・ペルツ氏を取締役に据えるよう他のディズニー株主を促し、「持続的な価値破壊」と既存取締役会を非難（Drew Richardson/CNBC）
item.description:
Drew Richardson / CNBC:
Disney investor Ancora urges other Disney shareholders to put Nelson Peltz on the board and blasts the existing board for “sustained value destruction”  —  - Activist investor Ancora issued a letter to Disney shareholders urging the company to add Nelson Peltz to its board.

item.title: ニュースUKとクリス・フーン元英閣僚の弁護士が電話ハッキング事件で和解に達した。
item.description:
Tom Symonds / BBC:
Lawyers for News UK and former UK Cabinet minister Chris Huhne reach a settlement in a phone hacking case that Huhne says includes a “six figure sum” in damages  —  The publisher of the Sun and the News of the World has agreed a “six figure” settlement to a phone-hacking claim from a former government minister.

item.title: TikTok、Instagram、YouTubeなどの番組を制作する制作スタジオFazeWorldが、750万ドルの評価額で75万ドルのシードラウンドを調達（Axios）
item.description:
Axios:
FazeWorld, a production studio that creates shows for TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, and others, raised a $750K seed round at a $7.5M valuation  —  FazeWorld, a production studio that's created viral TikTok shows, has raised a $750,000 seed round at a $7.5 million valuation from a slew of big names in media …
